Installation

Note: You may need to be logged in as root, depending on the permissions of the directories where you choose to install Value Browser.

This product is built with, and depends on, Qt version 4.1 and newer. You must have Qt installed on the machine that you are using to build this product.

Currently Value Browser is available for Qt >= 4.1.x.

How to build:

  • 1. Unpack archive to the directory where you wish to keep Value Browser (i.e. "vb3").
  • 2. Go to the "build" directory.
    1. 3a. To build from command line - run qmake, then make.
    2. 3b. If you're using MS Visual Studio 2005 - open "libvb4.vcproj" project and build it within the Studio.
  • 4. You should get the library file in "lib" directory.

To build demo, go to "demo" directory and perform the same steps as above. "demo" executable should appear there.
